code: var replaceHtmlSymbols=function replaceHtmlSymbols(string){var str=string;var entityMap={"&":"&","<":"<",">":">",'"':"\"","'":"'","/":"/"," ":" "};var keys=Object.keys(entityMap);var values=Object.values(entityMap);for(var i=0;i<keys.length;i++){var re=new RegExp(keys[i],'g');str=str.replace(re,values[i]);}return str;};export default replaceHtmlSymbols;
